attributes.action: Call an immediate General Election due to the resignation of Liz Truss
attributes.additional_details: We haven't had a general election in the passing 3 PM's, meaning we have been stripped of our democratic right to vote our own PM. This ordeal is sending the UK as a nation backwards, and revoking any and all rights for freely voting in who we actually desire to the role of Prime Minister of this country.
attributes.background: Call an immediate General Election to restore democracy to the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
